title: high ping :(
body:
Hello, i recentley got back to the game and i have a problem with my ping. it's usualy stays on 150-200 ms and i constantly get spikes to 500+.

i use wifi since i can't use wired connection currently. i play on euw and i live in israel, so its kinda far from the server but my ping should not reach more than 100.
on other games it works fine...

please help, ty ;)

replies.body: A combination of an already higher ping with sudden lag spikes is not fun, and I'd like to help.  These issues are generally caused by connection problems, and the sudden spikes might be due to packet loss.  I suggest starting off with our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot this towards a resolution.  If it's possible, trying a wired connection can really help rule out any possibilities with the issue being your wi-fi.  Let me know if that clears things up!

Hi, this morning the game worked great and i got about 85 ping. but from around noon it got worst with 150-200 ping, and now in the evening i get 350 ping.
after the match where i got 150-200 ping i done some of the suggestions on the troubleshooting guide, but it doesnt seem to help...
